steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 1), increase(1)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(2), number_in_box(3), put_result_into_box(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 1), number_in_box(2)), then_go_to_step(4), then_go_to_step(6)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 2), increase(2)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 2), number_in_box(2)), then_go_to_step(2), then_go_to_step(8)),
Put(number_in_box(2), into_box(8)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(9), 1), number_in_box(7)), then_go_to_step(1), then_go_to_step(7)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(2), 2), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(4), into_box(4)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 8?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在8号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Change Instruction 6: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Multiply: ( number in box 2 ) * ( number in box 3 ), put result into box 1.
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 2 )
Change Instruction 9: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 2
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 2 )
Put ( number in box 2 ) into box 8
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 9 greater than ( number in box 7 )
Change Instruction 2: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 4 ) into box 4
desc_zh: 更改指令6：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
相乘：2号盒子中的数字*3号盒子中的数字，将结果放在1号盒子中。
判断：指令6中第1个盒子的编号比2号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令9：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加2
判断：指令2中第2个盒子的编号比2号盒子中的数字大吗
将2号盒子中的数字放在8号盒子中
判断：指令9中第1个盒子的编号比7号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令2：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
将4号盒子中的数字放在4号盒子中
